body.p: Change the directory to the LDK work area ./ldk_r0.9_cdns/training/setup/cadence/ldk, and then source the sourceme file, if this is the first time launching Cadence tools, from the shell you are working in.

ol.li: Type the command abstract & to launch the AG (Figure 38).

image.alt: A screenshot of a computer Description automatically generated

ol.li: From the AG menus, select File > Library > Open. Then select the library ldk_demo_lib. Click OK. (Figure 39 shows that library as having been selected.)

p.i: Figure 40: AG UI after library open

image.alt: A screenshot of a computer Description automatically generated

body.p: All the cells should be in the Core bin. If not, select the cells in the other bin(s), and then use Cells > Moveâ€¦ to move them into the Core bin.

Bins are like buckets for placing cells. Each cell in a library is always contained in one bin. Each bin is associated with specific options, which allows the cells in a library to be distributed into mutually exclusive sets for processing. For example, AG uses the option settings for a bin to determine how to treat the cells in the bin. There are five predefined bins, one for each of the five main types of cells: Core, IO, Corner, Block and Ignore (to store any cells you do not want to process at a particular time). Cells placed in the Ignore bin are excluded from the set of cells to be processed but not deleted.

ol.li: From the AG menus, select File > General Options... On the General tab, Pin purpose name should be pre-set to pin. If not, update it (Figure 40).

image.alt: A screenshot of a computer program Description automatically generated

ol.li: On the Views tab, Logical view name should be pre-set to schematic. If not, update it, and then click OK (Figure 41).

image.alt: A screenshot of a computer Description automatically generated

ol.li: Select the Core bin, highlighting it. From the AG menus, select Cells > Select All (Figure 42).

body.p: All cell libraries are processed in the next steps.

image.alt: A screenshot of a computer Description automatically generated
